messages.alpha: The {field} field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {field} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {field} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The {field} field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: The {field} field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The {field} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {field} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The {field} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {field} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {field} field is not a valid file
messages.image: The {field} field must be an image
messages.integer: The {field} field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The {field} field must be {max} or less
messages.max: The {field} field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The {field} field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The {field} field must be {min} or more
messages.min: The {field} field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The {field} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The {field} field is not a valid value
messages.size: The {field} field size must be less than {size}KB
